content: ends and block notes to achieve a snugger fitting crown decrease body height by 1 inch a smoother fiber choice like super wash merino will make a hat with more drape as opposed to an untreated wool like is used in the sample try holding a dk weight strand and a laceweight mohair together for a fluffy version don t forget to mark one side of the hat so it is easy to tell the front from the back tag me on ig @adri__enna with #theonehat so i can enjoy them with you stay cozy my friends abbreviations co- cast on sts- stitches k- knit p- purl bor- beginning of round gsr- german short row ds- distorted stitch sm- slip marker k2tog- knit two together ssk- slip slip knit slip the first stitch knit wise slip the next stitch purl wise and knit them together through the back loop the one by adrienna
